name: Ancient Ascian Society
description:
"I'm not saying it was Ascians, but..."
 Difficult group to deal with but comes by often with surprise orders.

orders.title: Emet Sourdough
orders.description:
"Do not squander it. The pre-ferment I leave you."
 14 Loaves of Sourdough using special starter dough.

orders.title: Fandanish
orders.description:
"Free at last to live for the muffin!"
 10 Custard Danish Pastries, 3 Lemon Muffins

orders.title: Lahabread
orders.description:
"The earth is fertile, and the seeds well sown. By my will, they shall reap nourishment unlike any the world has known."
 13 Cornbread Squares

name: Scones of the Seventh Dawn
description:
"Look instead to the light within, that you may continue to serve as a baker to others."
 Non-Profit Organization that hosts diplomatic guests and orders snacks for their meetings from us.

orders.title: Coffee Biscuits
orders.description:
"They're light and crispy and when you dip them in the coffee they go all nice and squidgy!"
 24 Coffee Biscuits in a picnic basket with a thermos of hot coffee

orders.title: Archon Loaves
orders.description:
"Baked with either fish or vegetable flour, this fluffy loaf of rye bread is─from a nutritional standpoint─wholesome indeed."
 2 Archon Loaves

name: Normal Cafe
description: Small cafe that orders baked goods to sell daily.

orders.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
orders.description: 50 large chocolate chip cookies, milk chocolate
